data.system_settings: iPhone 6s - iOS 11.4, iPad Air 2 - iOS 11.4.1 PB
data.actual_result: It automatically scrolls back in message history. Note: This issue also happens without force closing the app but haven't found steps for it so far. It might happen when the channel must completely reload.
data.expected_result: Chat should keep position (at the beginning of the new unread message).
data.short_description: Chat automatically scrolls back in message history when opening a channel with a very new long message
data.steps_to_repro: - With one account write a very long message (it should go off-screen) and send it in a channel with some message history - With other account open this channel - Don't scroll there, just press the home button after opening the channel - Force close Discord via the app switcher - Go back to Discord
